document_data.mainbody:
Khamtar Raofal was a ship captain from Caer Callidyrr and the regional agent of the Moonstars for the Moonshae Isles, Lantan and Ruathym in the Year of the Tankard, 1370 DR.
Originally from Callidyrr, Khamtar was captain of the Ravens Eye, a ship that sailed the Sword Coast from Lantan to Luskan. At one point he was recruited into the Moonstars.
